globalHandlerMessage.duplicatedKey: Duplicate field value: {{duplicatedField}}. Please use another value!
globalHandlerMessage.duplicatedEmail: An user with email: {{duplicatedValue}} already exists! Please use another email!

jwtMessage.expiredError: Your login has expired! Please login again to access this route!
jwtMessage.jwtError: Your login is not valid! Please login again!

cartMessage.requiredUser: A cart item must belong to a user!

cartMessage.requiredQuantity: A cart item must have a quantity!
cartMessage.minQuantity: A cart item must have a quantity of at least 1!
cartMessage.productOutOfStock: Product with ID:{{productId}} does not have enough stock ({{stockQuantity}})!
cartMessage.cartItemNotFound: Cannot find cart item with ID:{{cartItemId}}!

imageMessage.requiredName: An image must have a name!

orderItemMessage.requiredProduct: An order item must be a product!

orderItemMessage.minQuantity: An order item must have a quantity of at least 1!
orderItemMessage.requiredPrice: An order item must have a price!
orderItemMessage.productOutOfStock: Product with ID:{{productId}} does not have enough stock ({{stockQuantity}})!
orderItemMessage.orderItemNotFound: Cannot find order item with ID:{{orderItemId}}!

statusMessage.requiredUpdatedBy: A status must be updated by a user!

orderMessage.requiredUser: An order must belong to a user!
orderMessage.requiredStatus: An order must have a status!
orderMessage.requiredOrderItems: An order must have order items!
orderMessage.requiredOrderItemsLength: An order must have at least 1 order item!
orderMessage.requiredFullname: An order must have a fullname!
orderMessage.requiredShippingAddress: An order must have an address!
orderMessage.requiredTelephone: An order must have a telephone number!
orderMessage.reuqiredTotalPrice: An order must have a total price!

productMessage.requiredName: An product must have a name!
productMessage.minlengthName: An product name must have at least 5 characters!
productMessage.maxlengthName: An product name must have at most 200 characters!

productMessage.minPrice: An product price must be greater than 0!
productMessage.requiredStockQuantity: An product must have a stock quantity!
productMessage.minStockQuantity: An product stock quantity must be greater than 1!
productMessage.requiredCreatedBy: An product must be created by a user!

userMessage.requiredEmail: An user must have an email!

userMessage.invalidEmail: Invalid email! Please use a valid email!
